title: Need tips on how i can improve

embed.description: Showcasing Ability, Taunt, Recall, Death and Respawn Animations for the Arclight Vel'Koz Skin. Available for 1350 RP in the Riot Store.

replies.body: looks liek u buy alot of rp, gift me ok
I never gift RP or Mystery Gifts to people i don't know or have never had on my friends list for a certain amount of time.
Sorry, If you were on my friends list and we played a few rounds together then maybe but otherwise i **never** give out free gifts.

Try and do a PeacePigeon-tage.

We haven't got a famous OCE youtuber...right?
Maybe make videos that are creative and not been done before.
